GroupProject Soccer City Finder Deezer Lyrics Search
Password Please input password Login Watch Highlights Save Your match title loading
Hello blank fragment Highlights
Welcome to Geo Data Source Enter latitude and longitude to find out the nearby cities: Type latitude here Type longitude here SEARCH SHOW FAVORITE CITIES HELP HELP Favorite Cities Remove from Favorites Type in a latitude e.g. 45.424721, a longitude e.g. -75.695000 (City of Ottawa) to find out its nearby cities Tips: Back to Geo Back Save as Favorite Show on Google Map About this project This is Geo Data Source activity written by Xiao Yu Close Open Instructions for this App About the API Donate to Project Instructions - Use this app to search for nearby cities of a specific latitude and longitude.
- Click on a nearby city to view its details including country, region, latitude, longitude and currency.
- You can save a city to you favorite cities list, and view your all your saved favorite cities.
- You can also remove a saved favorite city by entering the favorite city detail view and click on the remove button Back Please give generously How much money do you want to donate? Thank You Cancel $$$> Saved> Deleted>
Hello blank fragment
Song Title Artist/Band Name e.g. Police Search Lyrics Search e.g. Roxanne Favorites Google Please fill in both artist/band name and song title Added to the favorite list Removed from the favorite list Undo Do you want to remove this song from the favorite list? Yes No
Load last search Lyrics not found About this project This is the lyrics search activity, written by Mei Gao Close Open Instructions for this app About the API Donate to Project Instructions Main View
* Enter artist/band name and song name in the input boxes and click search button to get the lyrics
* Check "load last search" box to redo the last search
* You can also click any item in the favorite list to view the lyrics saved locally
* Long click items in the favorite list will bring up a dialog for deleting the song from the list

Lyrics View
* Click the heart button will add/remove the song into/from the favorite list
* Click the google button will bring up the google search page for the song
OK Please give generou$ly How much money do you want to donate? Thank you cancel $$$
